template<class Ty >

 XML attribute extraction.
template<class Ty >
Ty parse_attr (boost::property_tree::ptree const &node, std::string const &attr)
 XML attribute extraction.

Detailed Description

TREX basic utilities.

This namespace embeds different classes that are not necessarily specific to TREX but eases different implementation aspect of it.

You'll find here classes providing very basic features such as thread management, exceptions, and other general design patterns.

Normally classes and code defined here is provided by the dynamic library named TREXutils.

Function Documentation

template<class Ty >
Ty TREX::utils::parse_attr ( boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type const &  node,
std::string const &  attr 
) [inline]

XML attribute extraction.

Template Parameters:
Ty output type
Parameters:
node An XML node
attr Attribute name

This method extract attribute attr from node and parses it as a Ty variable

Precondition:
node has the attribute attr
the value of attr can be parsed into the type Ty
Exceptions:
XmlError Unable to find attribute attr
bad_string_cast Cannot parse the value of attr as Ty
Returns:
The parsed value from attr
See also:
template<class Ty> Ty const &parse_attr(Ty const &, rapidxml::xml_node<> const &, std::string const &attr)
